entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Marieville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
